channel.title: Startup on chrisbarra.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Startup on chrisbarra.xyz

item.title: Why, startup quote api and Docker
item.description: My first blog and my first post. The reason to start a blog ? The Why ? (I’ve just finished reading Start with Why by Simon Sinek….) Share my experience and projects Learn about your experience and projects Although in the last 100 years technology improve our lives quality about a 10x factor, we still study/learn in the same way of 2000 years before. Write and read are still the best method to share knowledge.
